document_data.name: Zannastar
document_data.mainbody: '''Zannastar''' was a mage in service of the [[Cult of the Dragon]] in the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In {{yearlink|1356}}, [[Salvarad]] suggested him to [[Naergoth Bladelord]] as [[Malark Himbruel]]'s replacement as a [[Wearer of Purple]]. Though they ultimately settled on [[Thiszult]] instead, Salvarad viewed Zannastar as competent without being overly headstrong.
